com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container

Class PageContentHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.container.PageContentHelper

  • public final class PageContentHelper
extends Object
    Static utility methods used in construction of WComponent web pages.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko

    • Method Detail

      • addAllHeadlines

        public static void addAllHeadlines(PrintWriter writer,
                   Headers headers)
        Shortcut method for adding all the headline entries stored in the WHeaders.
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer to write to.
        headers - contains all the headline entries.

      • addHeadlines

        public static void addHeadlines(PrintWriter writer,
                List headlines)
        Add a list of html headline entries intended to be added only once to the page.
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer to write to.
        headlines - a list of html entries to be added to the page as a whole.

      • addJsHeadlines

        public static void addJsHeadlines(PrintWriter writer,
                  List jsHeadlines)
        Add a list of javascript headline entries intended to be added only once to the page.
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer to write to.
        jsHeadlines - a list of javascript entries to be added to the page as a whole.

        Parameters:
        writer - the writer to write to.
        cssHeadlines - a list of css entries to be added to the page as a whole.
